name.description: The name of the project. This is used in the compiled project name.

namespace.description: The namespace used for the project. The namespace 'minecraft' is not a valid string for this field.

packs.description: Stores the list of paths to the project's packs.

.*.description: Path to the pack relative to the config.json.

targets.description: Defines the project output location. The key is the target id, and the value is the target path.

ignorePaths.description: Additional glob patterns to ignore when building the project.

minify.description: Whether to minify JSON, MoLang, and TypeScript in build mode.

initialCleanUp.description: Whether to clean-up the target folder before compiling the project.

scriptEntryName.description: The entry file for GameTest scripts.
